pitch.@cc: Dangerous count for Rick Porcello; Denard Span is a dead-red fastball hitter, with a .861 OPS against them this season and .737 against everything else.
Rick Porcello is having trouble locating his two-seam fastball, missing the strike zone with his last three.
Rick Porcello battled back from 3-0 to retire Denard Span.
